title: Starts of the Week + Week 7 Breakdown, Rumor Fight! - Fantasy Football Podcast for 10/21
description:
It’s football time! Week 7 is here and The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason dive into Week 7 matchups and reveal their Starts of the Week! Plus, Deshaun Watson trade rumors, injury updates, and a new edition of “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for October 21st, 2021.
  
 (03:55) - Never Not Working
 (14:45) - NFL News 
 (25:00) - Fantasy Forecast
 (25:15) - Washington Football Team at Packers
 (30:15) - Chiefs at Titans
 (35:10) - Falcons at Dolphins
 (40:20) - Jets at Patriots
 (45:35) - Panthers at Giants
 (49:45) - Starts of the Week
 (50:40) - QB Starts of the Week
 (52:30) - RB Starts of the Week
 (54:45) - WR Starts of the Week
 (56:20) - TE Starts of the Week
 (59:05) - Boom Boom Kicker of the Week
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
